  • Uses of Drawable in org.jfree.chart.block

    Subinterfaces of Drawable in org.jfree.chart.block
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    Block
    A block is an arbitrary item that can be drawn (in Java2D space) within a rectangular area, has a preferred size, and can be arranged by an Arrangement manager.

    Modifier and Type
